entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -24.6°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
